question.text: During periods of illness your ability to drive may be impaired. You MUST

explanation.text: Be responsible and only drive if you’re fit to do so. Some medication can affect your concentration and judgement when dealing with hazards. It may also cause you to become drowsy or even fall asleep. Driving while taking such medication is highly dangerous.

answer.text: see your doctor each time before you drive
only take smaller doses of any medicines
take all your medicines with you when you drive
